doc.field: New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records

This subseries consists materials created and collected by NYFA documenting the organization's Arts in Education (AIE) program that provides funding for arts programs in schools. Materials include correspondence, memorandum, and research notes; Technical Assistance Program (TAP) application forms and panelists' recommendation forms; Artists in the School Community application forms and panelists' recommendation forms; Artists and Teachers Partnership for Excellence Multiple Intelligences Project post- and pre-tests forms, including teacher comments and state education department information for schools under registration review (SED-SURR); Design Education Initiative resources, which include external information from various institutions in collaboration NYFA utilized to create the program; and correspondence and memorandum for the New York City Music Initiative.
The Arts in Education (AIE) program was funded by the New York City Department of Education under the New York Foundation for the Arts.
